results.title: Cecil B. Demented
results.creator_credit: Studio Canal, Artic Productions, John Fiedler, Joe Caracciolo Jr, Mark Tarlov and John Waters
results.brief_description: John Water’s Cecil B Demented is an anarchic kick to the bloated carcus that is mainstream Hollywood feature films. No one escapes Waters’ skewered assault as he derides the mediocrity that now inhabits the American studio system. The plot is a compendium of Waters’ previous film work and favorite obsessions, offering up kidnapping, demented ciniphiles, scathing parodies (the highlight being the Forest Gump sequel, ‘Gumped again’) and highly specific sexual perversity. Steven Dorf stars as Cecil B Demented, the deranged leader of the ‘Sprocket Holes’, a gang of film fanatics hell bent on overthrowing the Hollywood A-list and out to “punish bad cinema”. Their insane plan involves kidnapping megalomanic movie star Honey Whitlock (Melanie Griffith relishing her role as the bitchy diva) and forcing her to appear in their own underground movie. What ensues is a wild parody of hollywood movie making, while Waters affectionately sends up his own days as a filmmaking terrorist. Cast includes: Alicia Witt, Mink Stole, Ricki Lake, Patricia Hearst, Adrien Grenier, Larry Gillard Jr.

results.title: Ce Cher Victor = that Dear Victor
results.brief_description:
Two elderly friends, sensitive Anselme and blustering Victor, decide to set up housekeeping together in order to save money. Although the men have been friends for 40 years, this new arrangement brings out their different sensibilities and puts a lot of stress on their friendship.

Credits: Producer, Yves Witner ; director, Robin Davis ; writer, Patrick Laurent, Robin Davis ; photography, Yves Lafaye, Philippe Rousselot ; music, Bernard Gerard ; editor, Jose Pinheiro
Cast: Bernard Blier, Jacques Dufilho, Alida Valli, Jacqueline Doyen, Philippe Castelli, Jacques Rispal.

results.title: Caverns and geysers
results.brief_description: Illustrates how underground water is constantly changing our earth. We see the results of its action in limestone regions where underground water has dissolved out large caverns. In a few areas we see spectacular hot springs and geysers, created when volcanic rock heats water under the ground. Filmed with the co-operation of Carlsbad Caverns National Park, Sequoia National Park and Yellowstone National Park.

results.title: Cave man
results.brief_description: Animated cartoon featuring Willie Whopper. While paying a visit to the Natural History Museum, Willie relates a tall tale about how he saved his girlfriend Mary from a dinosaur.

results.title: Cavalcade of Australia
results.brief_description: On the celebration of Australia’s Jubilee as a Commonwealth, Australian film production organisations, both government and commercial, made available for this film archival material from their libraries. The film shows highlights of the important events of the first 50 years of the Federation. Music by Sydney John Kay.

results.title: Caulfield: a Living City
results.creator_credit: Caulfield Film Society, Caulfield City Council, Ewart Wade and John Freney-Mills
results.brief_description:
Weekend activities in the City of Caulfield. Schools, churches, sporting and social service groups keep the city alive at weekends. Activities include the running of the Caulfield Cup, and quieter games such as tennis and bowls. School children learn road safety at special classes and attend the Youth Centre. For the elderly citizens there are “meals-on-wheels”.

(11/2/19 CC) Selected highlights list from MP:
00:00:02:00 Title card with Caulfield Town Hall in background
00:00:32:00 Caulfield train station
00:01:07:00 Caulfield Race Course on Caulfield Cup
00:01:54:00 Caulfield marching girls perform with Caulfield Citizen band
00:03:54:00 Packer Reserve Bike Track with St Johns Ambulance attendees
00:04:35:00 Caulfield Park Bowling Club with men playing bowls and women playing croquet at 00:04:56:00
00:05:20:00 Caulfield Central RSL
00:05:50:00 cricket game on H.G Ritchie Oval
00:06:12:00 15th Caulfield Somers Country scouts packing glass bottles into a 1950’s Holden Ute
00:06:40:00 model aeroplane flying with Caulfield Technical College - now Monash University (Caulfield campus) in background
00:07:02:00 City of Caulfield Memorial Youth Centre with basketball being played and wrestling with up and coming star Don Fitzpatrick
00:08:00:00 Women sewing at the Caulfield Memorial Youth Centre
00:08:38:00 Curraweena homes near Caulfield community hall
00:09:55:00 Salvation Army marches past Salvation Army building
00:10:20:00 Church service at St Catharine South Caulfield, 402 Kooyong Rd
00:11:07:00 Salvation Army band play at Nooralie Private Hospital
00:12:24:00 what appears to be St Aloysius Church with spire
00:12:44:00 Caulfield Park Conservatory and gardens
00:14:00:00 garbage collection from house and people leaving for work
00:14:52:00 shot of Caulfield Technical College now Monash University (Caulfield campus) and students entering the front stair case
00:15:05:00 Kilyington Baptist Grammar School
00:15:30:00 Caulfield South Pre-school
00:15:52:00 Elsternwick train station
00:16:08:00 asphalt laying
00:16:28:00 Sir Henry Gullett Memorial Baby Health Centre
00:16:43:00 Elderly Citizen Club and meals service
00:18:27:00 Caulfield Town Hall inside and outside
